title: A Practical Roadmap for Adopting Vibe Coding
author: Emilio Salvador
description: Vibe coding must be implemented thoughtfully with proper governance to ensure that speed doesn't come at the expense of quality and maintainability.
cntitle: 采用 Vibe Coding 的实用路线图
cndescription: Vibe coding 的实施必须经过深思熟虑，并有适当的治理，以确保速度不会以质量和可维护性为代价。
